display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gsRVL-isRCQQ7kNvwHy_3tq&_nc_oc=Adm0DvMdP__LunfcM3XOXQO5g064yXEKXJEIHBmljDbrkP4-lU9nPI2lIDGe_68uPGQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cGkTQJL-EwSmGoL888TJuQ&oh=00_AfNCsjDcx4MRFqT00WGk97ZAtKjFrA7Zg6bc9fGs1H496w&oe=684D0E1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=TZqaopFtVacQ7kNvwF-icP4&_nc_oc=AdlFeF6xkDBl6DRsXDBIN2AjIMYxhaXhf7a9Z09gL4dueHvzybVudKJcep8Tg-sXlzY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cGkTQJL-EwSmGoL888TJuQ&oh=00_AfPNrIfhrA_uOiKRajXnVHJEjXQmVxk9liDzr8ifPBvlTg&oe=684CEFD2)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=a_-A3P_ya2QQ7kNvwE72vgL&_nc_oc=AdkA0cKi5IlXkrWzAYbMpN4jw4XyNJDA5BK15Oa7soGgDqlOJBEU1GhcX6w5Fy_ytzU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cGkTQJL-EwSmGoL888TJuQ&oh=00_AfOcqmgvBW37jphCM53tMs1UUNlm3uzXFnN8hT3iOC157Q&oe=684CF5E3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=2EskY0SWEtcQ7kNvwGwz2Zx&_nc_oc=Adl7wirg9bTggB3618hsr8q0z4K3ZPCThn9DuueZ54tXMeMIuMmFx0DMLI6X1fVtX60&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cGkTQJL-EwSmGoL888TJuQ&oh=00_AfNw6U13sUYUpRj3D3HSXJveDu8aq6qZ30PBQS5c6KyVGw&oe=684CEC6E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=LlyqehcwZioQ7kNvwHnXK1z&_nc_oc=AdkyjkDcBu4TGEdfIVJ9HxkV_zIVJEmgjZ_NFVI53SQ863SOTODqu9vSCGDMTcdV_ns&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cGkTQJL-EwSmGoL888TJuQ&oh=00_AfPp26mIGLIvGDQV4SJydCgDLF8hwXgkcqnzjMr8-RAy0A&oe=684CF456)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
